# tf.keras.datasets.reuters.get_word_index

``` python
get_word_index(path='reuters_word_index.json')
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/datasets/reuters.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/datasets/reuters.py).

Retrieves the dictionary mapping word indices back to words.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`path`</b>: where to cache the data (relative to `~/.keras/dataset`).


#### Returns:

The word index dictionary.
